attributes.review: This app kept crashing and wouldn’t stay open on my phone. Every time I would click on the app, it would immediately go straight to my home screen. Just a terrible terrible app!
attributes.title: Kept crashing

attributes.review: While downloading this app, my phone crashed several times. Once it was finally downloaded, I had to restart my phone to actually open it. Not to mention the design flaws that the app entails. Do not get this app.
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: If you want one of the worst apps, then this is your bet. It took up too much storage for the trash it is. I hope it gets deleted from the app store sooner rather than later. We don’t stan supporting a white supremacist in this country 🥰✨
attributes.title: Actually Awful

attributes.review: this app is the WORST thing i’ve used in my life. I can’t even get pass the loading screen!!! buttons do not work and i’m stuck on a horrid picture. i will never escape. this app has ruined my life. Save yourself from the never ending he11 and DO NOT install this app 😔
attributes.title: DO NOT INSTALL 😓😓👺👺😳😳

attributes.review: He is really the worst president ever tried to make us start another war for what? See he don’t even no tbh he just a white man with too much power that needs to be stripped. He needs to be taken down a few pegs nahhh never mind all the pegs need to be removed. Point blank.
attributes.title: Lame

attributes.review: The app kept making my phone shut down every few minutes and eventually it started to even make it very impossible to access any of my other apps.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: The app took A WHOLE DAY to download and then after I decided to read the news, they were outdated and fake!! What’s the point of this app if the news are going to be fake!!! And then the app would also freeze and lock my phone🤢🤢🤢🤢 wouldn’t recommend EVERRRR!!!!
attributes.title: THE WORST🤢

attributes.review: i downloaded and the app kept crashing and it kept making my phone crash too. it was absolutely horrible. i just wanted to his pointsand events but  if he’s going to make my phone( life)  crash I don’t want him as president.
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: i am just appalled at the fact that he asked for my phone number, i am a MINOR and he is married this is absolutely horrifying. maybe one day we will grow up in a world where this will not happen but as for now this app should be taken off of the app store.
attributes.title: I AM SHOCKED AT HOW HORRIBLE THIS IS

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app I couldn’t move for some reason suddenly I got a text from Donald trump telling me that if I wanted to be able to move again I would have to vote for him 10/10 do not recommend this app
attributes.title: Don’t download
